PlayerJump
MonoBehaviour
public
PlayerJump

Handles the jump mechanic of the player.

Private Variables
Parameters
_jumpInitialVelocity

The initial jump velocity value.

_jumpActionMaxHoldingTime

Maximum time in witch the player can hold the jump button and still ascend.

_permitedArialTime

Time that the player can still jump if falling from a platform.

Essential Components
_rigidBody

The RigidBody of the player.

Public Variables
OnJump
public static System.Action<bool> OnJump

Sends a signal when start jumping and on stop

Properties
Helper Properties
About

Properties that help the player to acess certein informations faster.

Vars
IsJumping

Returns if the player is jumping or not.

Calls the Setup Methods.

Jump Logic
Jump
public void Jump()

the Jumping Action of the player

EndJump

Ends the Jumping Action

CanJump
public bool CanJump()

Decides if the player can jump or not.  Returns: True if the player can jump at a given frame.

CanRaiseJump
public bool CanRaiseJump(
float jumpTime
)

Determins if the player can raise the jump already started.  Parameters: jumpTime - The time in seconds that the player has held down the jump button.  Returns: True if the player can follw the jump.
